meanings: illusion, delusion, mistake (A for B), mix up (with), flatter oneself (that), delude oneself into doing
take the license for the liberty

examples.korean: Her energy and youthful good looks belie her 65 years. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀의 정력과 젊음이 넘치는 미모는 65세라는 나이를 착각하게 만든다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: She had been deluding herself that he loved her. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 그가 자기를 사랑한다고 착각을 하고 있었던 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
